Articles.Content:
Lots of people here might remember the very cool "Man Conquers Space" teaser trailers for a movie that apparently never happened. Well, in that same spirit, I offer "Kerbal Conquers Space".

http://youtu.be/65SbkAYnTUg

Man Conquers Space Is still being made it is not over yet By A long shot ......

But Good Video!
Well I am glad to hear that, I just haven't heard anything about it since like 2010. I would be very happy to see it once it gets done.
